english.segment1: I still feel the same. though everything has changed. the pain it cost now. I feel lost inside of my own name
english.segment2: but I keep running. I am running. I keep living for the day that I'm with you. that I'm with you
english.segment3: the past has left its stain. now I feel the shame. I'll seize the day. if you take away. the chains of yesterday
english.segment4: but I keep running. I am running. I keep living for the day that I'm with you. and I am waiting. I am waiting. I keep waiting for the day that I'm with you
english.segment5: a new day. the sun is shining. seems I'm closer to finding. that life is more than where we are. no way that I am TURNING. as long as the sun is burning. now it seems that all I want is you
english.segment6: I still feel the same. though everything has changed. the pain it cost now. I feel lost inside of my own name
english.segment7: but I keep running. I am running. I keep living for the day that I'm with you. an I am waiting. I am waiting. I keep waiting for the day that I'm with you. that I'm with you
